text: Christos Xenofontos (; born January 6, 1989) is a former Cypriot footballer. He plays as a striker and winger. Xenofontos started his career at AEK's Academy. ==External links== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:AEK Larnaca FC players Category:Cypriot footballers Category:Association football forwards
title: Christos Xenofontos
